devdoc.details: This smart contract demonstrates a clear and concise way that we plan to deploy smart contracts.With the goal of deploying replicate-able non-fungible token smart contracts through this process.This is just the first step. But it is fundamental for achieving cross-chain non-fungible tokens.

BridgeableContractDeployed(address,bytes.details: This event is fired every time that a bridgeable contract is deployed.

constructor.details: Constructor is left empty and only the admin address is set.

deployHolographableContract((bytes32,uin.details: A sample function of the deployment of bridgeable smart contracts.The used variables and formatting is not the final or decisive version, but the general idea is directly portrayed.

deployHolographableContract((bytes32,uin.notice: In this function we have incorporated a secure storage function/extension. Keep in mind that this is not required or needed for bridgeable deployments to work. It is just a personal development choice.
